name: The Maelstrom's Tendril
tooltip:
The Maelstrom's TendrilLevel 60

Ah, <name>, it is good to smell you again.



You'll have to excuse my sense of humor. It can be most foul at times.

I sense that you have caused great anguish to our enemies. The forces of Hakkar cry out your name in anger. This is most excellent.

You have earned another weave on your talisman. Hand it to me.

Requirements:
- Maelstrom's Tendril
